level.heading: STI PROGRAM – EXTENSIONS FOR GOOD CAUSE AFTER TWO YEARS HAS EXPIRED (§9-2534)

level.text: Participants may be eligible for extensions beyond the two (2) year STI Program timeframe under the following circumstances:
The family has completed their Service Plan and is still financially unable to afford the housing unit without assistance;

The family has not completed their Service Plan based on good cause circumstances, an extension will assist the family to complete the services plan, and the family is still financially unable to afford the housing unit without assistance; or

The family has not completed their Service Plan and an extension is not sufficient to assist the family to complete the Service Plan and transfer to another placement is the most appropriate placement based on the client’s current Service Plan, but a transfer placement is not currently available.
The length of all extensions shall be at the discretion of the STI Program, based on the client’s Service Plan, the family’s individual circumstances, and availability of resources.
